QuestData.Title: Crazed and Confused
QuestData.Description: Don't worry about this dragon, $n. We've got plans for it...$B$BDeeper in this mine is a band of crazed Murkblood. After the dragon broke out, they were cut off from the exit. Somehow, after a mere 2 days of isolation, they've lost all sense of decency.$B$BThey've resorted to cannibalism and the promotion of mayhem. We don't need that kind of madness in this place. Find 'em and kill 'em. All of 'em.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ronag the Slave Driver in the Netherwing Mines of Shadowmoon Valley wants you to slay the Crazed Murkblood Foreman and 5 Crazed Murkblood Miners.
QuestData.RewardText: Yeah, I don't understand it... You would think that they wouldn't even be that hungry after 2 days. Murkblood...$B$B<Ronag shakes his head.>$B$BDamn they're stupid...
